pr_title: Prevent NPE when null set in container's volume mounts

timeline.message:
Prevent NPE when null set in container's volume mounts

Signed-off-by: arjantijms <arjan.tijms@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Or we could just check v != null here, right?
timeline.author: jglick

replies.bodyText: At line 273 c.getVolumeMounts().stream() will then still throw a NPE. If you check that for null as well, then it will prevent the NPE, but not add the default volume mount as intended.
replies.author: arjantijms
